title: Horror Movies and Fear in Modern Society - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/22/17
itunes:title: Horror Movies and Fear in Modern Society - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/22/17
description:
George Noory and guest Chris Anderson discuss the ongoing popularity of horror movies, and why they often reflect the fears of society.
